text:
RepoPulse forecast (7-day breakout watchlist)

Method: reproducible baseline model using public GitHub signals (no LLM).
Breakout = +max(200 stars, +50%) within 7 days.

1) affaan-m/everything-claude-code | 98% | stars now 34079 → est 63265 (range 63159-63371)
   https://github.com/affaan-m/everything-claude-code
2) antfu/skills | 95% | stars now 1850 → est 17883 (range 17858-17908)
   https://github.com/antfu/skills
3) lukilabs/beautiful-mermaid | 94% | stars now 960 → est 10121 (range 10096-10146)
   https://github.com/lukilabs/beautiful-mermaid
4) forrestchang/andrej-karpathy-skills | 94% | stars now 1797 → est 9597 (range 9572-9622)
   https://github.com/forrestchang/andrej-karpathy-skills
5) lucasgelfond/zerobrew | 93% | stars now 3812 → est 7495 (range 7460-7530)
   https://github.com/lucasgelfond/zerobrew

Daily forecasts are logged publicly, then scored 7 days later (hits, misses, calibration).
#opensource #software #datascience #forecasting #github
